metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23307 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
CVE-2020-9493 identified a deserialization issue that was present in ApacheChainsaw. Prior to Chainsaw V2.0 Chainsaw was a component of Apache Log4j1.2.x where the same issue exists.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23307` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblog4j1.2-java - 1.2.17-11
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: apache-log4j1.2 package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.17-11').
